review:
If I am typing this pain-free today, It's because of Dr. Manikandan, one of the best surgeons in Chennai today. I had consulted him for my trigger finger surgery; six months ago I had to quit my job as my hand was "out of service", and today my hand shows no evidence of any surgery being done, that's his magic. He is very approachable, explains your problem to you, makes you understand what's really wrong, why it went wrong, and how to manage it. He's very punctual, only once in my 15 odd follow-up consultations he was 10 minutes late, and he apologized for that too! 
He''s quite charming with a great sense of humor and down to earth; most importantly a great doctor and a greater human being. Take a bow, Sir!!!

review: I met with an accident some 8 yrs back my thigh bone was shattered Dr Manikandan treated me and made me to walk and have a normal life again recently I reinjured the same leg and again he had made me to walk and have a normal life I'malways indebted to him

Very unexpectedly nice experience in a seemingly small and not so luxurious clinic.i went with a fracture of the little toe finger and the doctor quickly fixed it with a procedure. 
easy to talk to and multi lingual gentleman.go if you know only hindi also. or marathi or gujarati. ..

Met the doctor for back pain. L5\S1 disc was giving me hell a lot of problems. Consulted 2 other orthopedic surgeons who suggested me for operation straight away.I was shocked as well as surprised. But I met Dr. Manikandan.he first gave me tablets and put a caudal epidural steroid injection.now iam feeling really comfortable for the last 2 weeks.very good doctor.listens well to what u say and then gives treatment according to that

Yes, it was hand ortho injury & nicely treatment by doctor to my mother. He diagoniced in right manner with an initial xray test rather than taking scan & all.Got back her normal activities with in a week.
